recipe.name: Sweet Potato Cake
recipe.preparation:
Melt 1 cube margerine in pan. Cool. Stir in 1 egg + 1 jar jr size baby food sweet potatoes. Stir. Add 1 small can crushed pineapple, drained.
Sift 1 1/4 cup flour with 1 cup sugar, 1 tsp soda, 2 tsp cinnamon + 1/2 tsp salt. Add to above + stir with fork Add 1 cup chopped nuts + bake 325F for 45 mins
Frosting: 1 small pkg cream cheese 2 Tbsp butter 1/2 pkg powdered sugar 1 tsp vanilla
